properties.name: Intersex Family and Support Network
properties.description: The Intersex and Family Support Network serves the families of intersex people, parents and babies, children, teenagers, and particularly intersex adults.

properties.name: National Network of Abortion Funds
properties.description: The National Network of Abortion Funds builds power with members to remove financial and logistical barriers to abortion access by centering people who have abortions and organizing at the intersections of racial, economic, and reproductive justice.

properties.name: TransWave Jamica
properties.description: TransWave is a non-governmental organization working to advance the health, welfare, and well-being of the transgender community in Jamaica and the Caribbean.

properties.name: iCon UK
properties.description: iCon UK represents the interests of people born with intersex traits/variations of sex characteristics (VSC) / diverse or differences in sex development (DSD), hereafter intersex* people and their communities.

properties.name: Intersex Nigeria
properties.description: The mission of Intersex-Nigeria is to create awareness about intersex through public education and social engagements, build a community space for intersex persons to co-habit, provide psychological and well-being support for intersex persons in Nigeria, and advocate for intersex rights in Nigeria.

properties.name: DeGenderation Confederation
properties.description: DeGenderation Confederation (DGC) is a non-profit organization working with the goal of abolishing the gender norm system towards sustainable and inclusive equality in society.

properties.name: Círculo Violeta
properties.description: Circulo Violeta emerges from the need to connect with other intersex, trans and non-binary artists.

properties.name: LEZ Connect
properties.description: LEZ Connect’s mission is to provide an environment for LBTQ women where they can feel safe and focus on their rights to put an end to violence against women.

properties.name: Guyana RainBow Foundation
properties.description: Guyana RainBow Foundation (GuyBow) is an organization founded in 2000 whose mission is to support and strengthen the capacity of Lesbian, Bisexual, and Queer women.

properties.name: Intersex Asia Network
properties.description: Intersex Asia works for/with intersex activists, organizations, and communities in Asia.

properties.name: Sayoni
properties.description: Sayoni is a Singapore-based feminist, volunteer-run organisation that works to uphold human rights protections for queer women, including lesbian, bisexual and transgender women. We organise and advocate for equality in well-being and dignity regardless of sexual orientation, gender identity/expression and sex characteristics.

properties.name: Diverse Voices and Action (DIVA) for Equality
properties.description: Diverse Voices and Action for Equality started in 2011 to formalize a growing grassroots LBTI peer support group in Suva, Fiji.

properties.name: Togetherness for Equality and Action (TEA)
properties.description: Togetherness for Equality and Action (TEA) is a lesbian, queer and bisexual women led group founded in 2013 and committed to building a sustainable and inclusive LBT movement in Thailand.

properties.name: Organisation Intersex International Europe
properties.description: OII Europe was founded in 2012, during the Second International Intersex Forum in Stockholm, to ensure the further adoption of Human Rights for intersex people all over Europe.

properties.name: Audre Lorde Project
properties.description: Audre Lorde Project (ALP) is a Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Two Spirit, Trans and Gender Non Conforming (LGBTSTGNC) People of Color (POC) center for community organizing, focusing on the NYC area.

properties.name: Colectivo No Tengo Miedo
properties.description: Colectivo No Tengo Miedo is an LGBTIQ collective in Lima with the mission of promoting social justice, liberation and equal access to resources for the LGBTQI community.

properties.name: Trans Bantu Association of Zambia
properties.description: Trans Bantu Zambia (TBZ) works to inform, educate and sensitise Trans* and intersex persons, particularly young people, families and their support structures.

properties.name: Humanity First Cameroon
properties.description: Humanity First Cameroon is an association that fights against HIV/AIDS, and defends and protects the human rights of vulnerable people including the LGBTQ community.

properties.name: Women’s Health and Equal Rights Initiative (WHER)
properties.description: WHER Initiative is a Nigerian feminist organization that brings together lesbian, bisexual and other sexual minority women from all over the country to collectively take action to advance and promote their rights and wellbeing.

properties.name: West Africa Trans Forum (WATF)
properties.description: West Africa Trans Forum (WATF) is a network of Trans * people and/or groups led by Trans, intersex and non-conforming * people in West Africa.

properties.name: Black and Pink
properties.description: Black and Pink is an open family of LGBTQ prisoners and free world allies who support each other.

properties.name: Gender Expansion Project
properties.description: The Gender Expansion Project’s mission is to promote gender-inclusive education and awareness surrounding transgender, transsexual, intersex, and gender diverse people through evidence based care, education, research, advocacy, public and private policy, and respect in transgender health and wellbeing.

properties.name: Not One More Deportation/Mijente
properties.description: The #Not1More Deportation campaign was launched in 2013 to pursue just and humane immigration policies, starting with a stop to deportations.

properties.name: Trans Siempre Amigas – TRANSSA
properties.description: TRANSSA is an institution that ensures the respect and equity of Trans people (Transgender, Transvestite, Transgender and Transgender) of the Dominican Republic.

properties.name: Women’s Initiatives Supporting Group (WISG)
properties.description: Women’s Initiatives Supporting Group (WISG) is an LBT-led feminist group working to ensure the full involvement equal participation in social, political, cultural and economic life for all women in Georgia.

properties.name: LGBT Organization Labrys
properties.description: Labrys was formed in April 2004 by a group of young lesbian and bisexual women and transgender men with the mission to achieve equal rights, justice and non­-discrimination for LGBT communities through empowering them, giving them voice and protecting their rights and freedoms.

properties.name: Radical Queer Affinity Collective
properties.description: Founded in 2011 in Budapest, Hungary, Radical Queer Affinity Collective (RQAC) is a transnational queer and trans feminist collective committed to building a network of activists in Hungary.

properties.name: Trans-Fuzja Foundation
properties.description: Founded in 2008, the Trans-Fuzja Foundation has grown remarkably to take on ambitious campaigns towards the achievement of legal, social, health and human rights of the full spectrum transgender, non-binary and gender-diverse people in Poland.
